all: Experience with student information management systems

jd:
Dear Partner,

Good Morning,

Greetings from Nukasani Group Inc! We have below urgent long-term contract project immediately available for .NET Application Developer, Jackson, MS, Remote. We need submissions; could you please review the below role? If you are available, could you please send me an updated word resume and below candidate submission format details immediately? If you are not available, any referrals would be greatly appreciated. Interviews are in progress, urgent response is appreciated. Looking forward to your immediate response and working with you.

**Candidate Submission Format - needed from you**
- Full Legal Name
- Personal Cell No (Not google phone number)
- Email Id
- Skype Id
- Interview Availability
- Availability to start, if selected
- Current Location
- Open to Relocate
- Work Authorization
- Total Relevant Experience
- Education / Year of graduation
- University Name, Location
- Last 4 digits of SSN
- Country of Birth
- Contractor Type
- DOB: mm/dd
- Home Zip Code

**Assigned Job Details**
- Job Title: .NET Application Developer
- Location: Jackson, MS, Remote
- Rate: Best competitive rate

This position will require a qualified Web App Developer to take the lead in the following tasks:
- Designing applications
- Creating applications
- Coding applications
- Updating applications
- Testing products for functionality and errors

**REQUIRED SKILLS/EXPERIENCE**
- Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (e.g. HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, jQuery) - 10 years
- Hands-on experience working as a React.js developer - 8 years
- Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, Node.js) - 10 years
- Hands-on experience working in Azure DevOps, Utilizing pipelines - 10 years
- Familiarity with application design, documentation, and coding - 10 years
- Experience working in Agile Team - 5 years
- GitHub - 10 years
- Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web services and UI/UX design - 7 years
- Knowledge of Azure functions and Application Insight - 5 years

**ADDITIONAL REQUIREMENT**
Three (3) references of submitted candidates required. Please provide the following information. Must submit with resume.
- First/last name of reference
- Title
- Company Name
- Job title of contractor while reporting to this supervisor/manager
- Telephone number
- Email Address (if available)

Preference given to candidates with the below skills/experience. Must also meet minimum requirements.
- Experience with student information management systems and K-12 data and reporting is a plus
- DevOps principles, and cloud architecture is a plus

Thanks regards,
Bhavani | Technical recruitment | Nukasani Group | 1001 E Chicago Ave, Unit B 111, Naperville IL 60540.
Email: bhavaniATnukasanigroupusa.com
People, Process, Technology Integrator. An E-Verified Company
